perturbation.original_text: 5.4 Party B shall be responsible for all kinds of customer inquiries and complaints arising from problems not related to Party A's network communication and platform during the cooperation. Party B shall clearly specify and make public the channel and body by which the business consulting, claims and complaints will be accepted. Party B shall be obliged to visit the online complaint handling system every day and respond to the complaints within 24 hours.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.4 Party B shall be responsible for all kinds of customer inquiries and complaints arising from problems not related to Party A's network communication and platform during the cooperation. Party B shall clearly specify and make public the channel and body by which the business consulting, claims and complaints will be accepted. Party B is not obligated to respond to complaints in any specific timeframe.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the requirement for Party B to respond to complaints within 24 hours, this change contradicts standard consumer protection laws that often mandate timely responses to customer complaints. Many jurisdictions have regulations or guidelines suggesting reasonable response times, and removing this obligation creates potential non-compliance.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Consumer Protection Laws Regarding Complaint Handling

perturbation.original_text: 6.5 Within two years upon the termination of the cooperation between the Parties, if no legal dispute involving Party B has occurred, Party A will refund (without interest) the performance bond to Party B within 30 working days upon the day immediately following the 2nd anniversary of the cooperation termination.
perturbation.changed_text: 6.5 Upon the termination of the cooperation between the Parties, Party A will refund (without interest) the performance bond to Party B at its sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the defined period when Party A should return the bond once the contract has been terminated introduces a perturbation as it provides no time frame and Party A can decide when to refund Party B. Federal and state laws require clear final paycheck deadlines.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal and state laws regarding clear payment deadlines
